metadata.description: Voyager Skill Library - Ever-growing executable skill registry
metadata.architecture: Temporally extended, interpretable, compositional skills that compound agent capabilities

skills.name: import_config_constants
skills.description: Centralizes configuration and constants imports to reduce duplication and enable easy maintenance
skills.purpose: Eliminate magic strings and scattered configuration values across codebase

skills.name: migrate_to_utils
skills.description: Extracts repeated patterns and migrates them to utility modules for code reuse and maintainability
skills.purpose: Consolidate duplicated utility functions and reduce code duplication across modules

skills.name: add_test_coverage
skills.description: Comprehensive test coverage with happy path and error scenarios
skills.purpose: Apply systematic test patterns ensuring code reliability and enabling safe refactoring
postconditions: Happy path tests verify correct output

example_1.name: Configuration-First Refactoring
example_1.workflow: First centralize configuration, then migrate utilities that depend on central config
example_1.benefit: Clean configuration enables consistent utility implementations

example_2.name: Safe Code Migration
example_2.workflow: Move duplicated code to utils, then add comprehensive tests to prevent regressions
example_2.benefit: Testing enables confident refactoring without breaking changes

example_3.name: Complete Module Refactoring
example_3.workflow: Organize configuration, consolidate utilities, then add test coverage
example_3.benefit: 3-skill composition solves complete module refactoring faster than learning pattern from scratch

key_insights.temporally_extended: Skills are multi-step patterns that encapsulate learned processes
key_insights.interpretable: Each skill has clear preconditions, postconditions, and executable code
key_insights.compositional: Skills combine to solve larger problems - 3 base skills enable ~9 two-skill combinations
key_insights.capability_compounding: New skills leverage previous skills, enabling exponential ability growth
key_insights.retrieval: Keyword matching enables automatic skill suggestion matching task descriptions
